Upon starting the above application (or any other I've tried, for that matter),
I get a debug target showing the java process plus a single thread being shown
as suspended. However, the thread cannot be resumed (error when trying). 
Note that this works without a problem in 2005-01-25
What's the error you get when resuming the thread (is there a .log entry)?

Sorry Darin, I'm forgetting my manners ;-). Note that I didn't change any
preferences (i.e. timeout values) and that the error comes almost immediately
after clicking the 'resume' button.
